subject: First quarter budget

In a professional context it often happens that private or corporate clients corder a publication to be made and presented with the actual content still not being ready. Think of a news blog that's filled with content hourly on the day of going live.
Regards,
J.

The spread of computers and layout programmes thus made dummy text better known. While in earlier times several lines are likely to focus on the text, disregarding the layout and its elements.

subject: Feedback on the recent updates updates
body: Its words and letters have been changed by addition or removal, so to deliberately render its content nonsensical; it's not genuine, correct, or comprehensible Latin anymore.
